Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
This class provides logic for the Appointment DAO.

    • appointmentWithin15MinsAlerts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> appointmentWithin15MinsAlerts()
      This method sets up alerts for upcoming appointments that are within 15 minutes of the user's current time.
      Returns:
      alerts when there are incoming appts within 15 mins.

    • updateSelectedAppointment

      public static boolean updateSelectedAppointment(int apptIDNumber, String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, int contactName, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, int customerIDNumber, int userIDNumber) throws SQLException

    • deleteAppointmentByCustomer

      public static boolean deleteAppointmentByCustomer(int apptIDNumber) throws SQLException
      This method deletes an appointment associated with a customer where the customer ID matches the appointment ID. This method makes sure the associated appointment is also deleted when a customer is removed since in the virtual lab environment the foreign key on delete option isn't set to "cascade".
      Parameters:
      apptIDNumber - appointment ID number.
      Throws:
      SQLException
